name: AttributedString.FormattingOptions
desc: Options that affect the handling of attributes.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates an empty option set.

items.name: init<S>(S)
items.desc: Creates a new set from a finite sequence of items.

items.name: typealias AttributedString.FormattingOptions.Element
items.desc: The type of element for creating formatting options from a sequence.

items.name: init(arrayLiteral: AttributedString.FormattingOptions...)
items.desc: Creates a set containing the elements of the given array literal.

items.name: typealias AttributedString.FormattingOptions.ArrayLiteralElement
items.desc: The type of element for creating formatting options from an array literal.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a formatting options instance from the given raw value.

items.name: typealias AttributedString.FormattingOptions.RawValue
items.desc: The type of element for creating formatting options from a raw value.

items.name: static let applyReplacementIndexAttribute: AttributedString.FormattingOptions
items.desc: An option to add an attribute that marks replacements in localized strings.

items.name: let rawValue: UInt
items.desc: The raw value of the option set.

items.name: var isEmpty: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the set has no elements.

items.name: func contains(AttributedString.FormattingOptions) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether a given element is a member of the option set.

items.name: func formIntersection(AttributedString.FormattingOptions)
items.desc: Removes all elements of this option set that are not also present in the given set.

items.name: func formSymmetricDifference(AttributedString.FormattingOptions)
items.desc: Replaces this set with a new set containing all elements contained in either this set or the given set, but not in both.

items.name: func formUnion(AttributedString.FormattingOptions)
items.desc: Inserts the elements of another set into this option set.

items.name: func insert(AttributedString.FormattingOptions) -> (inserted: Bool, memberAfterInsert: AttributedString.FormattingOptions)
items.desc: Adds the given element to the option set if it is not already a member.

items.name: func intersection(AttributedString.FormattingOptions) -> AttributedString.FormattingOptions
items.desc: Returns a new option set with only the elements contained in both this set and the given set.

items.name: func isDisjoint(with: AttributedString.FormattingOptions) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the set has no members in common with the given set.

items.name: func isStrictSubset(of: AttributedString.FormattingOptions) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether this set is a strict subset of the given set.

items.name: func isStrictSuperset(of: AttributedString.FormattingOptions) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether this set is a strict superset of the given set.

items.name: func isSubset(of: AttributedString.FormattingOptions) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the set is a subset of another set.

items.name: func isSuperset(of: AttributedString.FormattingOptions) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the set is a superset of the given set.

items.name: func remove(AttributedString.FormattingOptions) -> AttributedString.FormattingOptions?
items.desc: Removes the given element and all elements subsumed by it.

items.name: func subtract(AttributedString.FormattingOptions)
items.desc: Removes the elements of the given set from this set.

items.name: func subtracting(AttributedString.FormattingOptions) -> AttributedString.FormattingOptions
items.desc: Returns a new set containing the elements of this set that do not occur in the given set.

items.name: func symmetricDifference(AttributedString.FormattingOptions) -> AttributedString.FormattingOptions
items.desc: Returns a new option set with the elements contained in this set or in the given set, but not in both.

items.name: func union(AttributedString.FormattingOptions) -> AttributedString.FormattingOptions
items.desc: Returns a new option set of the elements contained in this set, in the given set, or in both.

items.name: func update(with: AttributedString.FormattingOptions) -> AttributedString.FormattingOptions?
items.desc: Inserts the given element into the set.

items.name: static func != (AttributedString.FormattingOptions, AttributedString.FormattingOptions) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two values are not equal.
